name: Ojarumaru: Tsukiyo ga Ike no Takaramono
summary: A game of the popular NHK educational anime "Ojarumaru". There are 3 modes: "Tabi-dachi niru (single-player mode)", "Tokukun-itashimasu (mini-game mode)", and "Welcome to me (two-player battle mode)". Set in Moonlight Town, the game is played in a sugoroku format, collecting items placed in each square, playing against each other in a mini game, and more when one of them finishes at the pond. The one who collects the points of is the winner.
